in_scope: Define RunReceipt struct with episode completion metadata
Include budget delta quantities (tokens, time, artifacts used)
Emit DefectRecord on context pack miss
Include pack manifest hash in receipt for reproducibility

steps: Define RunReceipt struct with fields: episode_id, pack_hash, sufficiency
Define PackMiss struct: stable_id, fetch_attempt_ns, reason
Add budget_delta: BudgetDelta with tokens_used, time_used_ms, artifacts_accessed
Add pack_manifest_hash: Hash for reproducibility binding
Define RunReceiptBuilder for accumulating misses during episode
Integrate builder into EpisodeController at line 652 (result construction)
Emit DefectRecord via evidence module on first pack miss
Write tests for: miss tracking, sufficiency computation, receipt generation

criteria: context_pack_misses tracks all ArtifactFetch failures during episode
DefectRecord emitted on first pack miss (not subsequent)
EpisodeLoopResult includes RunReceipt when pack is configured
All tests pass: cargo test receipt

notes.security:
Pack miss tracking creates feedback loop for pack completeness (DD-0003).
DefectRecord emission ensures visibility of consumption issues.
Pack hash binding enables reproducibility audits.
notes.architecture:
RunReceipt follows DD-0003 hermetic consumption feedback model.
Integrates with existing EpisodeResult (crates/apm2-holon/src/result.rs).
Uses TypedQuantity for budget_delta consistency with pack spec.
DefectRecord emission uses existing evidence module patterns.

rules: CTR-0703: Structured PackMiss with actionable context
CTR-1202: Borrowed view for misses iteration
